about_the_game:
Get all Twelve Season Six Pro pinball tables as they release for 50% off the price of buying them individually!

The Pro Version of a tables gives you access to the table Operator’s Menu (allowing you to change many factory default settings), the ability to move the ball around the table at will, a mode that lets you move the camera around the table, and tips on playing the table from IFPA pinball pros.

Tables Included: Indianapolis 500™, Big Hurt™, Eight Ball Deluxe™, Doctor Who™, Doctor Who™: Master of Time, Bone Busters™, Jacks Open™, Centigrade 37™, Gladiators™, Al's Garage Band Goes on a World Tour™, Cactus Jacks™, and Swords of Fury™.
detailed_description:
Get all Twelve Season Six Pro pinball tables as they release for 50% off the price of buying them individually!

The Pro Version of a tables gives you access to the table Operator’s Menu (allowing you to change many factory default settings), the ability to move the ball around the table at will, a mode that lets you move the camera around the table, and tips on playing the table from IFPA pinball pros.

Tables Included: Indianapolis 500™, Big Hurt™, Eight Ball Deluxe™, Doctor Who™, Doctor Who™: Master of Time, Bone Busters™, Jacks Open™, Centigrade 37™, Gladiators™, Al's Garage Band Goes on a World Tour™, Cactus Jacks™, and Swords of Fury™.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX Lion or Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+ support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Pinball Arcade: Season Six Pro Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 ghz or better.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
